projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus

content.title: Description
content.text: Accelerometers are used to determine the direction of gravity, and can be used to determine the orientation of devices. By orienting the accelerometer in different positions of known slopes, the concept of vectors can be visualized more clearly.

content.title: Materials
text: Two wooden dowels or pencils hinged together at one end

content.title: Author
content.text: Jason Alcarez, Kelvin Bartilad, Ralph Benedict Bucao
